Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\box\BoxListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\box\BoxListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\UrlGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\box\BoxPermissions. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to box.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
